pkgmetadata.longdescription:
To run:
# Standalone evaluation (for research only) ./orca-standalone-emulation.sh 44444
# Standalone real-network (ebuild mod) ORCA_SCHEME=cubic ./orca-real-network.sh
# Actor-Learner for starting a new learner model for training ./orca.sh 1 44444
# Actor-Learner for contining learner model training ./orca.sh 0 44444
# Actor-Learner for sample test ./orca.sh 4 44444

use.flag: Train DRL Agent for 6 hours each.
Install celluar-traces to train the DRL or to playback in the evaluator.
Install the kernel patch to apply on kernel sources.
